L + ratio + No PVE + Greedy Battlepass + Greedy microtransactions + No Meaningful updates + Bad Game Balance + Activision bad + ‚ÄúFrat boy‚Äù culture + Women harassment + Bobby cottick + Deleted overwatch 1 + incompetent team + Dead game.

BTW, go play TF2 or paladins or any other game, activision blizzard doesn't deserve your money.

Game recommendations (in US dollars):

Rust: 40$, goes on sale for really cheap, one of the best online survival games i have ever played, gets updates every month and with a lot more creativity and love than overwatch.

Garry's Mod: 9$, incredible mod support and free content for really cheap.

Halo: the master chief collection: 40$ for the best campaigns and multiplayer in the series history.

DOOM Franchise Bundle: Goes for sale really cheap for the best shooters in gaming history.

Valve complete pack: Some of the best singleplayer and multiplayer games of all time, you can find it really cheap on sale.

Black Mesa: 20$, A remake made by modders that surpases the original in many ways.

Old School RuneScape: Free, and one of the most fun and legendary MMOS of all time.

Severed steel: 25$, goes on sale a lot, one of the best indie shooters i have played in recent memory.

So disappointing

Fun game, genuine fun especially if you have some people to play with, but there's terrible company behind it.

After promising a full PvE experience with progression and replay ability with the sequel, then selling a key to that promise in the form of the Watchpoint Pack,  they went back on their word. They gutted the PvE, removed content from the original, and repeatedly disrespected the fanbase that stuck with them for 3 hard years of silence. They didn't even give those who supported them; the people who bought the Watchpoint pack before the game even came out, access to the PvE missions. 

It hurts to say that I enjoy Overwatch, because whenever I do I'm reminded of the decisions that Blizzard makes to bring this game down to the point where saying its your favorite game will have you insulted. This game is genuinely amazing and I do think its worth playing, but be warned of the disrespect you will be a victim of courtesy of Blizzard when you launch the game.

[h1] This game makes me enjoy CS:GO back [/h1]

I waited 3am just to post this >:) Honestly, this game is still barely alive is because of its R34 content, This game has no respect for its fan base, They lied about skill tree, They lied about Hero Missions, The audacity they have to add a pay wall to access PVE after the announcement is pure madness, we waited 4 years for this... a year since OW2's release and you gave us this crap. The balance of the characters were awful, look at roadhog after season 2... look at McCree's grenade... IS A BIRD? IS A PLANE? IS A HOSTILE HUNTER KILLER DRONE INBOUND. Don't even get me started about the battle pass... 

The only time I actually had "Fun" in Overwatch 2 is Season 1, the April's fool event, kiriko's badass trailer and witnessing Overwatch League died.

Quick play is toxic, The Dev were clearly clueless, The game is a total fraud. It's not the Overwatch that I used to play and loved... 

Let's hope Overwatch 3 can fix this...

People Review Bombing games. A tale as old as Time.

Hola, soy un antiguo jugador de Team Fortress 2, que lleva casi 2k horas acumuladas de juego y sumando.... Para hacer una review honesta, el Overwatch no est√° mal, es algo bueno y tal vez es un videojuego que parece como una pelicula Pixar en formato videojuego. Es un juego que tal vez no ha sido muy comprendido en el tiempo y me incluyo porque la verdad cuando sali√≥ como competencia a TF2 si era malo en su tiempo y sobrevalorado. Ahora volvi√≥ para ser bueno, con crossplay, y ahora con un posible soporte a Linux y Steam Deck, y pues yo creo que est√° bien, si lo comparan como por ejemplo con modelos de negocios cerrados que tiene Epic Games con Fortnite, que es bestialmente malo y consumista. Ignoren las masivas votaciones negativas hacia el juego porque en realidad la votaciones negativas son una indirecta a Blizzard, no al juego en si, aunque siendo honesto estoy muerto de risa por eso XD. Yo en lo personal si puedo decir que se acab√≥ la rivalidad entre Team Fortress 2 y Overwatch y eso es bueno, espero algun d√≠a ver una skin promocional de TF2 en Overwatch y algun miscelaneo o cosm√©tico promocional de Overwatch en TF2, o algo por el estilo.
Yo estoy esperanzado que Overwatch vino a Steam para mejor, porque la comunidad aqu√≠ es buena, y si tiran hate, es inofensivo porque el hate es chistoso en Steam. Al final todos se abrazan en Steam (Excepto en counter strike, todos se unen ah√≠ para pelearse en serio xd)
Por beneficio de la duda de que Overwatch en un futuro terminar√° por buen camino en Steam y que posiblemente tenga soporte con Linux y Steam Deck, haciendo competencia totalmente destructiva hacia Nintendo Switch, le doy un 10/10.

[7000 hours+ on battlenet]
I hate that I love this game, because god can it be a bitch.
Horribly handled by the devs for longer periods of times in the past, and disappointing news after disappointing news for the longest time.
But no other game quite scratches that itch the way this game does. The polish, and detail is unmatched. The feel of the game cannot be described with words. The friendships I've made along the way cannot be taken away.

For all that I hate you, I have so much I also love you for. Thank you Overwatch
